context_of_use: This use case allows customers to browse, search, view product details, add items to their cart, and complete the checkout process.
stakeholders_and_interests: customer: wants to purchase products easily
description: Enable customers to browse, search, view product details, add items to cart, and complete checkout.
preconditions: Customer is logged into the system.
postconditions: Customer successfully completes the purchase and receives a confirmation.
assumptions: The customer has a valid account to log in.
requirements_met: The system shall allow customers to browse products by category.
The system shall allow customers to search for products by keyword.
The system shall allow customers to view product details.
The system shall allow customers to add products to their cart.
The system shall allow customers to checkout using multiple payment methods.
main_flow: 1. Customer browses products by category → System displays products in the selected category.
2. Customer searches for products by keyword → System displays search results matching the keyword.
3. Customer views product details → System shows detailed information about the selected product.
4. Customer adds product to cart → System updates the cart with the selected product.
5. Customer proceeds to checkout → System processes the payment and confirms the order.
